Text_Content: Welcome to the Valve. Don't mind the steam; it keeps the ale warm.
Steam's getting low today... hope the boiler isn't acting up again.
You look like you've got business with Kaelen. I'll mark the Forge for you.
I smell the gutter on you. Keep your hands where I can see them.
Move along, citizen. Nothing to see but the smog.
You've got a spine. We need people who aren't afraid of the Shadow Row.
Don't bleed on the floor. I just cleaned it. Mostly.
I need more clean bandages... and less patients.
A fellow student of the blade and bone? Help me stitch this artery.
Strike while the iron is hot. Or don't. I'm busy.
You look like you can swing a hammer. I'll fix your gear, but it'll cost you.
The shadows are whispering today. You want to hear what they said about the Guard?
Eyes open, pockets closed. That's the rule here.
I saw a Guard drop a ledger near the post. Might be worth something to the right person.
The smell of the lower districts is quite... pungent on you. Move along.
I wonder if the Ruler will ever fix the filtration in Gold Heights.
Finally, someone who understands the importance of silk. Come, let's talk.
The Void is calling you, child. You're shaking. Can you hear the humming?
The silence is a lie. The Void is never quiet.
I don't know you. I don't want to know you. Get out.
Everything has a price. Even your life.
Fine. You've got the look of a criminal. Let's see your 'found' goods.
